name: Yuekang Li
content: Mr Yuekang Li Type in a search term Search Follow Follow LinkedIn Facebook Instagram TikTok YouTube Back to Mr Yuekang Li Lecturer Engineering Computer Science and Engineering Follow me Follow me Yuekang Li joins UNSW from Nanyang Technological University (NTU) where he worked in the Continental-NTU cooperate lab as a Research Assistant Professor. He obtained his Ph.D. degree and bachelor’s degree in 2020 and 2016 from NTU respectively. Yuekang’s research interests lie in various software engineering topics. In particular, he has been focusing on software testing/quality assurance techniques. He is passionate about applying testing techniques to different scenarios and solving some fundamental problems in dynamic program analysis. E-mail yuekang.li@unsw.edu.au Location School of Computer Science and Engineering Room 501-G, K17 Building UNSW Kensington Campus Publications Publications Media Media Grants Grants Awards Awards Research Activities Research Activities Engagement Engagement Teaching and Supervision Teaching and Supervision Books Book Chapters Edited Books Journal Articles Journal articles | 2025 Ge J;
